info.lead: Vote disparity within the selected parliamentary group for voting events in the National Assembly compared to the average and maximum value of disparity within all the parliamentary groups.
info.text: For each voting event we count which ballot (FOR, AGAINST, NOT PRESENT, ABSTAIN) was submitted by the parliamentary group's MPs. We calculate the percentage of those who voted for most popular option. That percentage is subtracted from 100 to get the level of deviation i. e. the percentage of MPs who did not vote the same as the majority.
